rule:
Inside each

tag, avoid using tags to emphasize key words or phrases.
input: Time flies. Memories last. Lessons teach.
coverage:
```html

Time flies. The hours pass swiftly and days seem to evaporate rapidly.

Memories last. The moments we cherish can live eternally in our hearts.

Lessons teach. Every experience provides valuable insights and guides our future actions.

```
validity:
The input consists of three sentences: "Time flies.", "Memories last.", and "Lessons teach.". These sentences are complete and grammatically correct. However, the input specification requires the presence of key words or phrases suitable for emphasis. Although each sentence is complete and concise, none of them contain any particular word or phrase that stands out as suitable for emphasis in the context provided. The sentences are short and straightforward, each consisting of only two words, without any significant detail to emphasize.

ERR
